first_chunks_preview.heading: 1. Power off your Meta Quest 2
first_chunks_preview.preview: # Meta Quest 2 Battery Disconnect Prereq  Steps to disconnect the battery for the Meta Quest 2. Prereq guide.   ## 1. Power off your Meta Quest 2 - Hold the power button for three seconds to fully turn off your headset. > **Note:** You'll hear a power down chime, and the LED next to the power button will turn off. ![Step 1 Image 3189987](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/SqbHLQOA2SemeF4D.ful

first_chunks_preview.heading: 2. Remove the facial interface
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 2. Remove the facial interface - Grasp and pull on the nose section of the facial interface to unclip it from the headset. ![Step 2 Image 3189886](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/B31djmGYZZHCBoti.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/B31djmGYZZHCBoti.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/B31djmGYZZHCBoti.medium, large=https://guide-

first_chunks_preview.heading: 3. Step 3
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 3. Step 3 - Grasp and pull on the top section of the facial interface to unclip it from the headset. ![Step 3 Image 3189882](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/Be2J2NaNLeqZuRhi.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/Be2J2NaNLeqZuRhi.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/Be2J2NaNLeqZuRhi.medium, large=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/

first_chunks_preview.heading: 4. Step 4
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 4. Step 4 - Remove the facial interface. - During reassembly, align the facial interface to the headset and use your fingers to press along the perimeter to clip it back in. ![Step 4 Image 3189880](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/uLFjxFFQlhXdWAtB.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/uLFjxFFQlhXdWAtB.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.co

first_chunks_preview.heading: 5. Unclip the side straps
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 5. Unclip the side straps - Use your fingers to grasp the right strap near the headset. - Peel the right strap away from the headset arm to unclip it. ![Step 5 Image 3205694](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/URh1oymFaf6RLYSM.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/URh1oymFaf6RLYSM.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/URh1oymFaf6RLYSM.

first_chunks_preview.heading: Meta Quest 2 Battery Disconnect Prereq
first_chunks_preview.preview: # Meta Quest 2 Battery Disconnect Prereq  Steps to disconnect the battery for the Meta Quest 2. Prereq guide.  ## 1. Power off your Meta Quest 2 - Hold the power button for three seconds to fully turn off your headset. > **Note:** You'll hear a power down chime, and the LED next to the power button will turn off. ![Step 1 Image 3189987](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/SqbHLQOA2SemeF4D.full

first_chunks_preview.heading: 3. Step 3
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 3. Step 3 - Grasp and pull on the top section of the facial interface to unclip it from the headset. ![Step 3 Image 3189882](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/Be2J2NaNLeqZuRhi.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/Be2J2NaNLeqZuRhi.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/Be2J2NaNLeqZuRhi.medium, large=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/

first_chunks_preview.heading: 5. Unclip the side straps
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 5. Unclip the side straps - Use your fingers to grasp the right strap near the headset. - Peel the right strap away from the headset arm to unclip it. ![Step 5 Image 3205694](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/URh1oymFaf6RLYSM.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/URh1oymFaf6RLYSM.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/URh1oymFaf6RLYSM.

first_chunks_preview.heading: 7. Remove the top strap
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 7. Remove the top strap - Separate the hook and loop strip on the top strap. ![Step 7 Image 3205701](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/hSyfJboRQGTssgOk.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/hSyfJboRQGTssgOk.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/hSyfJboRQGTssgOk.medium, large=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/hSyfJboRQGTssgOk.lar

first_chunks_preview.heading: 9. Remove the eyepiece trim screws
first_chunks_preview.preview: ## 9. Remove the eyepiece trim screws - Use a Torx T2 driver to remove the six 3.5 mm‑long screws securing the eyepiece trim. ![Step 9 Image 3190041](https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/yPeQSMKFUNr1DPW5.full) <!-- Image URLs: thumbnail=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/yPeQSMKFUNr1DPW5.thumbnail, medium=https://guide-images.cdn.ifixit.com/igi/yPeQSMKFUNr1DPW5.medium, large=https://guide-
